snippet: The staging of Chanel’s presentation rivals, and in some case eclipses, the clothes. Here, a look at yesterday’s set, and a few of the house’s greatest hits from recent seasons.
abstract: The staging of Chanel’s presentation rivals, and in some case eclipses, the clothes. Here, a look at yesterday’s set, and a few of the house’s greatest hits from recent seasons.

headline.main: A Recent History of Chanel's Couture Show Sets
